text:
I would like split a string every 250 caracters at 11 times : 
I try with this regexp : 

(.{0,250}){11}

I try with the RE Demo and I obtain this error message : 
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
-5353

I try with this regexp :
(.{0,250})(.{0,250})(.{0,250})(.{0,250})(.{0,250})(.{0,250})(.{0,250})(.{0,250})(.{0,250})(.{0,250})(.{0,250})

I obtain the same issue.

Best regards

I use jdk 1.4
creator: dutrieux@pasteur.fr

text:
I am unable to reproduce your problem with the latest Regexp release, 1.5. I
tried your regexp expression - (.{0,250}){11} - with some text, and it was
working just fine. You can try latest release here:
http://jakarta.apache.org/regexp/applet.html
creator: vgritsenko@apache.org

text: PS: AIOOBE could have been caused by bug 38331, fixed in regexp 1.5
creator: vgritsenko@apache.org
